Scripts.OnUpdate: if DiceMasterTraitsFrame.ModelScene:IsShown() then self:Disable() else self:Enable() end

Scripts.OnLoad: self:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonDown") self:RegisterForDrag("LeftButton")

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") if self.visible then GameTooltip:AddLine( "Visible", 1, 1, 1 ) GameTooltip:AddLine( "This skill will appear on the dice menu.", 1, 0.81, 0 ) else GameTooltip:AddLine( "Hidden", 1, 1, 1 ) GameTooltip:AddLine( "This skill will not appear on the dice menu.", 1, 0.81, 0 ) end GameTooltip:AddLine( "<Left Click to Toggle>", 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, true ) GameTooltip:Show()

local dice = DiceMasterPanelDice:GetText() local skill = DiceMaster4.Profile.skills[self:GetParent().skillPosition]; local modifiers = DiceMaster4.GetModifiersFromSkillGUID( skill.guid, true ) dice = DiceMaster4.FormatDiceString( dice, modifiers ) or "D20"; GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:AddLine( "Roll", 1, 1, 1 ) GameTooltip:AddLine( "Make a " .. dice .. " " .. skill.name .. " roll.", 1, 0.81, 0 ) GameTooltip:AddLine( "<Left Click to Roll>", 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, true ) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText( "Remove From Shop" ) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText( "Restock" ) GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT");

Scripts.OnLoad: if self.NineSlice then self.NineSlice:SetFrameLevel(2) self.PortraitContainer:SetFrameLevel(1) end self.Inset:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", 4, 40) --self.PortraitContainer.portrait:SetTexture( "Interface/AddOns/DiceMaster/Texture/logo" ) DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_OnLoad( self ) PanelTemplates_SetNumTabs(self, 3); PanelTemplates_SetTab(self, 1); DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_OnTabChanged()

self.ScrollBar:ClearAllPoints() self.ScrollBar:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", self, "TOPRIGHT", 6, -11) self.ScrollBar:SetPoint("BOTTOMLEFT", self, "BOTTOMRIGHT", 6, 9) self.ScrollBar.ScrollDownButton:SetPoint("TOP", self.ScrollBar, "BOTTOM", 0, 4) self.ScrollBar.ScrollUpButton:SetPoint("BOTTOM", self.ScrollBar, "TOP", 0, -4) self.ScrollBar.ScrollUpButton:Disable() self.ScrollBar.ScrollDownButton:Disable()
self:SetCustomTooltip( "|cFFFFD100Click to select an icon for this trait." )
self:SetAutoFocus( false ) self:SetTextColor( 1, 1, 1 ) self:SetMaxLetters( 40 )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to toggle the number of uses this trait has." ) self:RegisterForClicks( "LeftButtonDown", "RightButtonDown" )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to toggle the range of this trait." ) self:RegisterForClicks( "LeftButtonDown", "RightButtonDown" )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to toggle the cast time for this trait." ) self:RegisterForClicks( "LeftButtonDown", "RightButtonDown" )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to toggle the cooldown time of this trait." ) self:RegisterForClicks( "LeftButtonDown", "RightButtonDown" )
self:SetAutoFocus( false ) self:SetTextColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self:SetMaxLetters( 2400 )

FontString.name: $parentDesc
FontString.text: You don't have any skills yet. Choose a template below or click 'New' to get started:

Scripts.OnShow: UIDropDownMenu_Initialize( self, DiceMaster4.SkillFrameTemplate_OnLoad ) UIDropDownMenu_SetText( self, "Choose a Template" ) UIDropDownMenu_SetWidth(self, 150, 5)

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText( "Edit Pet" ) GameTooltip:Show() self.Hover:Play();

Scripts.OnLoad: _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText("Enable Pet")

Scripts.OnClick: PlaySound(857) if DiceMaster4.Profile.pet.isEgg then DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_WarmPetEgg() else DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_FeedPetItem() end

PlaySound(857) local lastCastTime = self.lastCastTime or 0; if time() - lastCastTime < 10 then UIErrorsFrame:AddMessage( "That ability is not ready yet.", 1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1 ); return end DiceMaster4.PetEditor_WashPet() CooldownFrame_Set( self.Cooldown, GetTime(), 10, 1 ) self.lastCastTime = time()

PlaySound(857) local lastCastTime = self.lastCastTime or 0; if time() - lastCastTime < 10 then UIErrorsFrame:AddMessage( "That ability is not ready yet.", 1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1 ); return end DiceMaster4.PetEditor_CleanPetDroppings() CooldownFrame_Set( self.Cooldown, GetTime(), 10, 1 ) self.lastCastTime = time()

Scripts.OnLoad: self:SetCustomTooltip( "|cFFFFD100Click to select an icon for your pet." )
self:SetAutoFocus( false ) self:SetTextColor( 1, 0.82, 0 ) self:SetMaxLetters( 30 )
self:SetAutoFocus( false ) self:SetMaxLetters( 30 )

Scripts.OnEnter: DiceMaster4.PetEditor_Happiness_OnEnter()

Scripts.OnClick: if not( DiceMaster4.Profile.pet.isComplex ) then DiceMaster4.ModelPicker_Open( DiceMasterTraitEditor, DiceMasterPetModel ) end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.skillIndex = 0; self.isExpanded = 1;
self:SetWidth(DiceMasterSkillFrameCollapseAllButton:GetTextWidth()+45);
ScrollFrame_OnLoad(self); self.scrollBarHideable = 1;
self:SetCustomTooltip( "|cFFFFD100Click to select an icon for this skill." )

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self.timer then self.timer:Cancel() end local skillMax = select(2, DiceMasterSkillDetailStatusBar:GetMinMaxValues()); local rate = 0.3; if ( skillMax > 50 ) then rate = 10/ skillMax elseif skillMax == 1 then rate = 0.1 end self.timer = C_Timer.NewTicker( rate, function() if self:IsMouseOver() and IsMouseButtonDown("LeftButton") then DiceMaster4.SkillFrame_IncreaseButton_OnClick( self, "LeftButton" ) end end) DiceMaster4.SkillFrame_IncreaseButton_OnClick( self, button )
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText( "Increase " .. self.skillName );
Scripts.OnLeave: GameTooltip:Hide(); if self.timer then self.timer:Cancel() end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: if self.timer then self.timer:Cancel() end local skillMax = select(2, DiceMasterSkillDetailStatusBar:GetMinMaxValues()); local rate = 0.3; if ( skillMax > 50 ) then rate = 10/ skillMax elseif skillMax == 1 then rate = 0.1 end self.timer = C_Timer.NewTicker( rate, function() if self:IsMouseOver() and IsMouseButtonDown("LeftButton") then DiceMaster4.SkillFrame_DecreaseButton_OnClick( self, "LeftButton" ) end end) DiceMaster4.SkillFrame_DecreaseButton_OnClick( self, button )
Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT"); GameTooltip:SetText( "Decrease " .. self.skillName );
Scripts.OnLeave: GameTooltip:Hide(); if self.timer then self.timer:Cancel() end

Scripts.OnLoad: DiceMaster4.SkillFrame_OnLoad(self);

Scripts.OnUpdate: if DiceMaster4.IsLeader( true ) then self:Enable() else self:Disable() end
Scripts.OnClick: PlaySound(857) UIDropDownMenu_Initialize( self, DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_LootOnLoad ) ToggleDropDownMenu(1, nil, self, self, 0, 0) self:SetHeight(22)

Scripts.OnMouseDown: CloseDropDownMenus() if button == "RightButton" then if IsAltKeyDown() and DiceMaster4.Profile.currencyActive > 1 then StaticPopup_Show( "DICEMASTER4_DESTROYCUSTOMCURRENCY", DiceMaster4.Profile.currencyActive, nil, DiceMaster4.Profile.currencyActive ) else UIDropDownMenu_Initialize( self, DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_CurrencyList_OnLoad ) ToggleDropDownMenu(1, nil, self, self, 0, 0) end end

Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_RIGHT") GameTooltip:SetText( "Edit Shop" ) GameTooltip:Show() self.Hover:Play();

Scripts.OnLoad: _G[self:GetName().."Text"]:SetText("Enable Shop")

Scripts.OnMouseDown: CloseDropDownMenus() if button == "RightButton" then if IsAltKeyDown() and DiceMaster4.Profile.currencyActive > 1 then StaticPopup_Show( "DICEMASTER4_DESTROYCUSTOMCURRENCY", DiceMaster4.Profile.currencyActive, nil, DiceMaster4.Profile.currencyActive ) else UIDropDownMenu_Initialize( self, DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_CurrencyList_OnLoad ) ToggleDropDownMenu(1, nil, self, self, 0, 0) end end

Scripts.OnLoad: self.page = 1;

Scripts.OnMouseDown: CloseDropDownMenus() if button == "RightButton" then if IsAltKeyDown() and DiceMaster4.Profile.currencyActive > 1 then StaticPopup_Show( "DICEMASTER4_DESTROYCUSTOMCURRENCY", DiceMaster4.Profile.currencyActive, nil, DiceMaster4.Profile.currencyActive ) else UIDropDownMenu_Initialize( self, DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_CurrencyList_OnLoad ) ToggleDropDownMenu(1, nil, self, self, 0, 0) end end

Scripts.OnLoad: self:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonUp", "RightButtonUp");
self:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonUp", "RightButtonUp");
self:RegisterForClicks("LeftButtonUp", "RightButtonUp");
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to delete this trait." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0.25, 0.5, 0, 0.25 )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to insert a colour tag." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0, 0.25, 0, 0.25 )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to insert an icon." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0.5, 0.75, 0, 0.25 )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to insert a list." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0, 0.25, 0.25, 0.5 )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to insert a line rule." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0.75, 1, 0, 0.25 )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to insert a DiceMaster term." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0.5, 0.75, 0.5, 0.75 )
Scripts.OnClick: UIDropDownMenu_Initialize( self, DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_TermsOnLoad ) ToggleDropDownMenu(1, nil, self, self, 0, 0) self:SetHeight(36)

Scripts.OnLoad: DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to insert a Health icon." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0.5, 0.75, 0.25, 0.5 )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to insert an Armour icon." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0.25, 0.5, 0.25, 0.5 )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to import a trait." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75 )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to export this trait." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0.25, 0.5, 0.5, 0.75 )
DiceMaster4.SetupTooltip( self, nil, "|cFFFFD100Click to edit this trait's effects." ) self.icon:SetTexCoord( 0.75, 1, 0.25, 0.5 )
Scripts.OnClick: UIDropDownMenu_Initialize( self, DiceMaster4.TraitEditor_EffectsOnLoad ) ToggleDropDownMenu(1, nil, self, self, 0, 0) self:SetHeight(36)
